scripts.build:web:portals: pnpm run build:web:b2c && pnpm run build:web:partner
scripts.dev:api:unix: bash -lc "python -m venv .venv || true; source .venv/bin/activate || true; python -m uvicorn babybook_api.main:app --app-dir apps/api --reload"
